description: Add an event destination to log event data from WhatsApp for a WhatsApp Business Account (WABA). A WABA can only have one event destination at a time. All resources associated with the WABA use the same event destination.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of your WhatsApp Business Account. WABA identifiers are formatted as waba-01234567890123456789012345678901. Use ListLinkedWhatsAppBusinessAccounts to list all WABAs and their details.

parameters.name: eventDestinations
parameters.description: An array of WhatsAppBusinessAccountEventDestination event destinations. (dict) --- Contains information on the event destination. The ARN of the event destination. roleArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to import phone numbers and write events.

nested_params.name: eventDestinationArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the event destination.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Identity and Access Management role that is able to import phone numbers and write events.
